# hasVerticalScroller

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the scroll view has a vertical scroller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var hasVerticalScroller: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the scroll view allocates and displays a vertical scroller as needed. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Managing Scrollers

- **horizontalScroller**: The scroll view’s horizontal scroller.
- **hasHorizontalScroller**: A Boolean that indicates whether the scroll view has a horizontal scroller.
- **verticalScroller**: The scroll view’s vertical scroller.
- **autohidesScrollers**: A Boolean that indicates whether the scroll view automatically hides its scroll bars when they are not needed.
